T&T 312

Crafting Components: Any item struck twice by nonmagical lightning

Requires attunement by a spellcaster

While holding this wand, you can use an action to expend 1 or more charges to cast @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.k72653sury5yomzn]{Lightning Bolt} (save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the spellâ€™s 3rd-level version. Increase the spell slot level by one for each additional expended charge.

This wand has 7 charges and regains [[/r 1d6+1 #charges]] expended charges each dawn. When the last charge is expended, roll a [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand emits sparks of electricity and disappears in a flash
